programme.desc: John Rambo vive tranquilo en un rancho en Arizona, pero cuando recibe la noticia de que una adolescente ha desaparecido tras haber cruzado la frontera a México para ir a una fiesta, decide ir en su búsqueda.

programme.title: Deadpool
programme.desc: Un exmercenario quien, tras haber sido sometido a un cruel experimento, adquiere el superpoder de sanar rápidamente y pretende vengarse del hombre que destrozó su vida.

programme.title: Robin Hood

programme.title: Noé
programme.desc: Dios elige a Noé para construir un arca y salvar a los animales y su familia de una inundación apocalíptica.

programme.title: Gladiador
programme.desc: Máximo, general romano, desea volver a casa, pero el emperador Marco Aurelio quiere que herede el imperio. Esto hace que Cómodo ordene matar a su familia. Máximo escapa de la muerte y regresa a Roma como gladiador para vengar la muerte de su familia.

programme.title: Terminator: Destino oculto

Sin embargo, también viaja al presente desde el futuro Grace, un híbrido entre cyborg y humano que debe, con la ayuda de Sarah Connor, proteger a Ramos del aparentemente indestructible robot asesino.

programme.desc: El clon de Ellen Ripley une fuerzas con mercenarios espaciales para escapar de una nave infestada de extraterrestres.

programme.title: Gretel y Hansel: Un siniestro cuento de hadas
programme.desc: En la Baviera del siglo XIV, Gretel y Hansel malviven en la miseria desde que su padre murió. programme.title: Vikingos

programme.title: Vikingos

programme.title: Godfather of Harlem
programme.desc: Elise, la hija de Bumpy, es arrestada por robar una tienda y sufre abusos durante la detención. Su caso es el detonante de una ola de protestas callejeras en las que hay varios grupos tratando de mover los hilos de la masa enfurecida.

programme.title: Godfather of Harlem
programme.desc: Cassius Clay pelea contra el héroe local, el boxeador Doug Jones, y Mayme le pide a Bumpy que apoye a Jones, pero Malcolm le ordena que apoye a Clay. Chin inicia una guerra en las calles contra Bonnano por el control de Harlem.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Michonne ve a Glenn y Maggie buscando provisiones, pero alguien más los observa: Merle, quien reconoce a Glenn como uno de los que le abandonó, a merced de los zombis, en una azotea de Atlanta. Entretanto, Rick sigue mentalmente inestable.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Michonne conduce a Rick, Daryl y Oscar a Woodbury para rescatar a Glenn y Maggie, a quienes el Gobernador está torturando para sonsacarles dónde se oculta el grupo de Rick.

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Cóndor

programme.title: Aquí en la Tierra
programme.desc: Rocha triunfa en los comicios y es nombrado candidato a la presidencia. Por su parte, Adán enfrenta una muerte inesperada.

programme.title: Future Man
programme.desc: Confunde a Wolf con Torque. Él aprende sobre las familias de seis padres y el odio hacia la tecnología que sienten en NAG.

programme.desc: Randall lucha con la ansiedad.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick accede a dejar salir de sus celdas a los prisioneros si les ayudan a matar a los zombis que quedan en la prisión. Entretanto, la salud de Hershel empeora por momentos.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Tasha jura que se vengará de James por el asesinato de Terry Silver, mientras el propio James pretende vengar a Tommy Egan. Entretanto, la AUSA recibe a un nuevo director.

programme.title: Vikingos
programme.desc: Las celebraciones duran poco después de la batalla de York. Los hijos de Ragnar Lodbrok se enfrentan entre ellos mientras las tensiones llegan a su punto máximo, y cada uno debe elegir un bando.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Elena Houghlin is a scientist, engineer and inventor of Calisto -- a sustainable energy source that will revolutionize the way people use power. But when the cutting edge technology falls into the wrong hands, Elena turns to the Townsend Agency for help. Now, it's up to the Angels -- Jane, Sabina and the newly recruited Elena -- to retrieve Calisto before it can be transformed into a weapon of mass destruction.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Tubbs and Crockett can't link a Chilean police chief to a double murder until they learn he plans to smuggle weapons.

programme.title: Knight Rider
programme.desc: Michael enters an off-road race to catch a mobster planning an illegal border crossing; guest Henry Darrow.

programme.title: The Professional
programme.desc: Mathilda (Natalie Portman) is only 12 years old, but is already familiar with the dark side of life: her abusive father stores drugs for corrupt police officers, and her mother neglects her. Léon (Jean Reno), who lives down the hall, tends to his houseplants and works as a hired hitman for mobster Tony (Danny Aiello). When her family is murdered by crooked DEA agent Stansfield (Gary Oldman), Mathilda joins forces with a reluctant Léon to learn his deadly trade and avenge her family's deaths.

programme.title: French Connection II
programme.desc: This sequel to William Friedkin's 1971 crime drama finds Detective "Popeye" Doyle (Gene Hackman) still hot on the trail of slippery drug trafficker Charnier (Fernando Rey), but this time in Marseilles, France. Uprooted from his familiar New York City beat, Doyle struggles to assert himself in a strange city and break the drug ring wide open. When Charnier's goons force him into a heroin addiction, the tough cop must summon every ounce of his courage to kick the habit cold turkey.

programme.title: Wrongfully Accused
programme.desc: Art patron Hibbing Goodhue (Michael York) is murdered, and an accident-prone concert violinist, Ryan Harrison (Leslie Nielsen), is arrested as the main suspect. Harrison didn't do it, but he's convicted of the crime. He's on the bus that will take him to prison, but he manages to escape after a traffic accident. On the run, Harrison tries to clear his name by seeking out the real killer, while the police, led by Lt. Fergus Falls (Richard Crenna), hunt him down.

programme.title: Braveheart
programme.desc: Tells the story of the legendary thirteenth century Scottish hero named William Wallace (Mel Gibson). Wallace rallies the Scottish against the English monarch and Edward I (Peter Hanly) after he suffers a personal tragedy by English soldiers. Wallace gathers a group of amateur warriors that is stronger than any English army.

programme.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
programme.desc: For Buffy Summers (Kristy Swanson), nothing is the same after she meets Merrick Jamison-Smythe (Donald Sutherland). Merrick tells the teen that he's been sent to train her to fight vampires, and he proves himself by displaying his supernatural powers. Buffy is a quick study, and soon takes fellow student Oliver Pike (Luke Perry) under her wing, repeatedly saving him from fierce bloodsuckers. But, when a very dangerous vampire (Rutger Hauer) gets rambunctious, she must go to war again.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: At the end of World War II, the Nazis attempt to open a portal to a paranormal dimension in order to defeat the Allies, but are only able to summon a baby demon who is rescued by Allied forces and dubbed "Hellboy" (Ron Perlman). Sixty years later, Hellboy serves as an agent in the Bureau of Paranormal Research and Defense, where he, aided by Abe Sapien (Doug Jones), a merman with psychic powers, and Liz Sherman (Selma Blair), a woman with pyrokinesis, protects America against dark forces.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland
programme.desc: It's International Elvis Week in Las Vegas, where the strip is flooded by a sea of King wannabes decked out in jumpsuits and sideburns. But five of the impersonators swaggering into the Riviera Hotel are toting heavy weaponry in their guitar cases. It's the heist of a lifetime, orchestrated by ex-con Michael (Kurt Russell) and his cunning former cellmate, Murphy (Kevin Costner). The crooked Elvises steal away with $3.2 million, leaving the hotel in ruins and a high body count in their wake.

programme.title: Glory
programme.desc: Following the Battle of Antietam, Col. Robert Gould Shaw (Matthew Broderick) is offered command of the United States' first all-African-American regiment, the 54th Massachusetts Volunteer Infantry. With junior officer Cabot Forbes (Cary Elwes), Shaw puts together a strong and proud unit, including the escaped slave Trip (Denzel Washington) and the wise gravedigger John Rawlins (Morgan Freeman). At first limited to menial manual tasks, the regiment fights to be placed in the heat of battle.

programme.title: Tears of the Sun
programme.desc: The Nigerian government has fallen, and the country is on the verge of civil war. Lt. A.K. Waters (Bruce Willis) has been assigned to lead a team of soldiers into the Nigerian jungle to rescue Dr. Lena Kendricks (Monica Bellucci). When Waters and his team locate Kendricks, she tells them she won't leave her helpless patients to be slaughtered by rebels. The team incurs the wrath of both U.S. and Nigerian forces when they side with Kendricks and attempt to march the refugees to safety.

programme.title: The 6th Day
programme.desc: A world of the very near future in which cattle, fish and even family pet can be cloned. But cloning humans is illegal -- that is until family man Adam Gibson comes home from work one day to find a clone has replaced him. Taken from his family and plunged into a sinister world he doesn't understand, Gibson must not only save himself from the assassins who must now destroy him to protect their secret, but uncover who and what is behind the horrible things happening to him.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: At the end of World War II, the Nazis attempt to open a portal to a paranormal dimension in order to defeat the Allies, but are only able to summon a baby demon who is rescued by Allied forces and dubbed "Hellboy" (Ron Perlman). Sixty years later, Hellboy serves as an agent in the Bureau of Paranormal Research and Defense, where he, aided by Abe Sapien (Doug Jones), a merman with psychic powers, and Liz Sherman (Selma Blair), a woman with pyrokinesis, protects America against dark forces.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: A cocaine investigation puts Tubbs on common ground with a Native American zealot exhorting his people against a dealer.

programme.title: Knight Rider
programme.desc: While investigating a mysterious fire in a beautiful park, Michael uncovers a $10 million drug trafficking operation.

programme.title: Night Watch
programme.desc: Hundreds of years ago there was a battle between the Warriors of Light and the evil Warriors of Darkness. Realizing that they were evenly matched, the two sides agreed to a truce. The fragile peace between good and evil is kept in place by two groups: the Day Watch and the Night Watch, each monitoring the opposing side. Now Night Watch member Anton Gorodetsky (Konstantin Khabensky) finds himself at the center of a prophecy that may mark the end of the delicate balance between the two sides.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: Abandoned by his parents and raised by an aunt and uncle, teenager Peter Parker (Andrew Garfield), AKA Spider-Man, is trying to sort out who he is and exactly what his feelings are for his first crush, Gwen Stacy (Emma Stone). When Peter finds a mysterious briefcase that was his father's, he pursues a quest to solve his parents' disappearance. His search takes him to Oscorp and the lab of Dr. Curt Connors (Rhys Ifans), setting him on a collision course with Connors' alter ego, the Lizard.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Crockett's (Don Johnson) scheming cousin (David Andrews) shows up in Miami with a daring new racket. Guest stars: John Santucci and Jesse Borrego.

programme.title: Juan of the Dead
programme.desc: When the dead rise and attack the living, Juan starts a zombie-killing business, until he has to save his small band from being eaten.

programme.title: Striking Distance
programme.desc: Sgt. Tom Hardy (Bruce Willis) denounces his partner, Jimmy Detillo (Robert Pastorelli), for brutally interrogating a suspect. After Jimmy falls to his death from a bridge, Tom is transferred from homicide to the river rescue team. Two years later, the bodies of murdered young women begin turning up in the water -- all of whom were previously romantically linked to Tom. With the help of his new partner, Jo Christman (Sarah Jessica Parker), Tom sets out to find the killer.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In need of a vacation from his ordinary life, factory worker Douglas Quaid (Colin Farrell) visits Rekall, a company that can turn dreams into real memories. Thinking that memories of life as a superspy are just the ticket, Quaid undergoes the procedure -- but it goes horribly wrong. Suddenly, Quaid is a hunted man. He teams up with a rebel fighter (Jessica Biel) on a search to find the head of the underground resistance and take down the leader (Bryan Cranston) of the free world.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: Abandoned by his parents and raised by an aunt and uncle, teenager Peter Parker (Andrew Garfield), AKA Spider-Man, is trying to sort out who he is and exactly what his feelings are for his first crush, Gwen Stacy (Emma Stone). When Peter finds a mysterious briefcase that was his father's, he pursues a quest to solve his parents' disappearance. His search takes him to Oscorp and the lab of Dr. Curt Connors (Rhys Ifans), setting him on a collision course with Connors' alter ego, the Lizard.

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: A Navy pilot (Owen Wilson) is shot down over enemy territory, and struggles to survive the relentless pursuit of a ruthless secret police enforcer, a deadly tracker, and countless hostile troops. With time running out, the injured pilot's commanding officer (Gene Hackman) goes against orders to carry out a desperate rescue mission.

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines II: Axis of Evil
programme.desc: Four Navy SEALS fight for their lives after a top-secret mission to destroy a missile site in North Korea goes awry.

programme.title: Striking Distance
programme.desc: Sgt. Tom Hardy (Bruce Willis) denounces his partner, Jimmy Detillo (Robert Pastorelli), for brutally interrogating a suspect. programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Crockett and Tubbs are repulsed at having to help a killer go free for fear their current undercover investigation might be blown.

programme.title: Knight Rider
programme.desc: Michael faces a firing squad when he attempts to rescue a Foundation contact arrested in a military coup.

programme.title: Braveheart
programme.desc: Tells the story of the legendary thirteenth century Scottish hero named William Wallace (Mel Gibson). Wallace rallies the Scottish against the English monarch and Edward I (Peter Hanly) after he suffers a personal tragedy by English soldiers. Wallace gathers a group of amateur warriors that is stronger than any English army.

programme.title: Cutthroat Island
programme.desc: Feisty Morgan Adams (Geena Davis) inherits her late buccaneer father's galleon and one-third of a map to buried treasure located on Cutthroat Island. The map had been tattooed on her father's scalp, and to find the treasure, she must locate and scalp his two brothers. But Morgan's swashbuckling uncle, Dawg Brown (Frank Langella), wants the treasure for himself, and does battle with his headstrong niece and her unwilling accomplice, Latin-speaking physician William Shaw (Matthew Modine).

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: Deirdre (Natascha McElhone) puts together a team of experts that she tasks with stealing a valuable briefcase, the contents of which are a mystery. The international team includes Sam (Robert De Niro), an ex-intelligence officer, along with Vincent (Jean Reno), Gregor (Stellan Skarsgard) and others. As their operation gets underway, several team members are found to be untrustworthy, and everyone must complete the mission with a watchful eye on everyone else.

programme.title: Night of the Living Dead
programme.desc: A disparate group of individuals takes refuge in an abandoned house when corpses begin to leave the graveyard in search of fresh human bodies to devour. The pragmatic Ben (Duane Jones) does his best to control the situation, but when the reanimated bodies surround the house, the other survivors begin to panic. As any semblance of order within the group begins to dissipate, the zombies start to find ways inside -- and one by one, the living humans become the prey of the deceased ones.

programme.title: Braveheart
programme.desc: Tells the story of the legendary thirteenth century Scottish hero named William Wallace (Mel Gibson). Wallace rallies the Scottish against the English monarch and Edward I (Peter Hanly) after he suffers a personal tragedy by English soldiers. Wallace gathers a group of amateur warriors that is stronger than any English army.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Following the death of his father, young Danny Madigan (Austin O'Brien) takes comfort in watching action movies featuring the indestructible Los Angeles cop Jack Slater (Arnold Schwarzenegger). After being given a magic ticket by theater manager Nick (Robert Prosky), Danny is sucked into the screen and bonds with Slater. When evil fictional villain Benedict (Charles Dance) gets his hands on the ticket and enters the real world, Danny and Jack must follow and stop him.

programme.title: Cutthroat Island
programme.desc: Feisty Morgan Adams (Geena Davis) inherits her late buccaneer father's galleon and one-third of a map to buried treasure located on Cutthroat Island. The map had been tattooed on her father's scalp, and to find the treasure, she must locate and scalp his two brothers. But Morgan's swashbuckling uncle, Dawg Brown (Frank Langella), wants the treasure for himself, and does battle with his headstrong niece and her unwilling accomplice, Latin-speaking physician William Shaw (Matthew Modine).

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland
programme.desc: It's International Elvis Week in Las Vegas, where the strip is flooded by a sea of King wannabes decked out in jumpsuits and sideburns. But five of the impersonators swaggering into the Riviera Hotel are toting heavy weaponry in their guitar cases. It's the heist of a lifetime, orchestrated by ex-con Michael (Kurt Russell) and his cunning former cellmate, Murphy (Kevin Costner). The crooked Elvises steal away with $3.2 million, leaving the hotel in ruins and a high body count in their wake.

programme.title: Braveheart
programme.desc: Tells the story of the legendary thirteenth century Scottish hero named William Wallace (Mel Gibson). Wallace rallies the Scottish against the English monarch and Edward I (Peter Hanly) after he suffers a personal tragedy by English soldiers. Wallace gathers a group of amateur warriors that is stronger than any English army.

programme.title: Heavy Metal
programme.desc: Adventures from deep space to futuristic New York, and beyond. Each world and story is dominated by the presence of the Loch'nar -- the sum of all evils manifest as a glowing green sphere whose power infects all times, all galaxies, all dimensions. To some, it appears as treasure, a green jewel they must possess. Others worship it as a god. Few escape it. Even in death and through death its powers continue. From war to war and world to world it seems invincible.

programme.title: Season of the Witch
programme.desc: His faith broken by many years fighting in the Crusades, a knight named Behman (Nicolas Cage) returns to Europe and finds it ravaged by the Black Plague. A dying cardinal orders Behman and his friend, Felson (Ron Perlman), to take an accused witch to a remote abbey, where monks will destroy her powers and end the pestilence. As Behman and five comrades undertake the dangerous journey, they come to realize that the prisoner is no ordinary girl, and evil forces await at the destination.

programme.title: The Scorpion King 2: Rise of a Warrior
programme.desc: After a swarm of enchanted scorpions kills his father, Mathayus (Michael Copon) flees and vows to even the score with ruthless sorcerer Sargon (Randy Couture). Upon returning home after years of combat training, Mathayus finds that Sargon has seized the crown and protected himself with a powerful spell. To retrieve the only weapon capable of destroying the tyrant -- a mystical sword -- Mathayus and lady warrior Layla (Karen David) set off for a labyrinth guarded by a deadly Minotaur.

programme.title: The Scorpion King 3: Battle for Redemption
programme.desc: Now-deposed Mathayus (Victor Webster) lends his battlefield skills to Egypt's King Horus (Ron Perlman), who must fight his own brother (Billy Zane) for the throne.

programme.title: Night Watch
programme.desc: Hundreds of years ago there was a battle between the Warriors of Light and the evil Warriors of Darkness. Realizing that they were evenly matched, the two sides agreed to a truce. The fragile peace between good and evil is kept in place by two groups: the Day Watch and the Night Watch, each monitoring the opposing side. Now Night Watch member Anton Gorodetsky (Konstantin Khabensky) finds himself at the center of a prophecy that may mark the end of the delicate balance between the two sides.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Tubbs and Crockett investigate an attorney who defends large-scale drug dealers, then steals and resells their merchandise.

programme.title: Phoenix
programme.desc: After superstitious cop Harry Collins (Ray Liotta) racks up significant gambling debts, he is given the option of killing an informant. Collins decides to instead rob a loan shark (Giancarlo Esposito) in order to pay off his bookie (Tom Noonan), so he can run off with bartender Leila (Anjelica Huston). He is aided by his rough partner, Mike (Anthony LaPaglia), as well as corrupt officers James (Daniel Baldwin) and Fred (Jeremy Piven), and the robbery quickly becomes more than Harry anticipated.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Elena Houghlin is a scientist, engineer and inventor of Calisto -- a sustainable energy source that will revolutionize the way people use power. But when the cutting edge technology falls into the wrong hands, Elena turns to the Townsend Agency for help. Now, it's up to the Angels -- Jane, Sabina and the newly recruited Elena -- to retrieve Calisto before it can be transformed into a weapon of mass destruction.

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: In the distant future, the Earth is at war with a race of giant alien insects. Little is known about the Bugs except that they are intent on the eradication of all human life. But there was a time before the war... A Mobile Infantry travels to distant alien planets to take the war to the Bugs. They are a ruthless enemy with only one mission: Survival of their species no matter what the cost...

programme.title: Heavy Metal
programme.desc: Adventures from deep space to futuristic New York, and beyond. Each world and story is dominated by the presence of the Loch'nar -- the sum of all evils manifest as a glowing green sphere whose power infects all times, all galaxies, all dimensions. To some, it appears as treasure, a green jewel they must possess. Others worship it as a god. Few escape it. Even in death and through death its powers continue. From war to war and world to world it seems invincible.

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: "Mercury Rising" stars Bruce Willis as Art Jeffries, a renegade FBI agent who combats ruthless federal agents to protect Simon (Miko Hughes), a 9-year-old autistic boy who has cracked the government's new unbreakable code. He can read MERCURY, the most advanced encryption code yet created, as easily as other kids read English. This ability renders the new billion-dollar secret code vulnerable, especially if enemies of the United States should learn of Simon's abilities and capture him.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Elena Houghlin is a scientist, engineer and inventor of Calisto -- a sustainable energy source that will revolutionize the way people use power. But when the cutting edge technology falls into the wrong hands, Elena turns to the Townsend Agency for help. Now, it's up to the Angels -- Jane, Sabina and the newly recruited Elena -- to retrieve Calisto before it can be transformed into a weapon of mass destruction.

programme.title: Black and Blue
programme.desc: A rookie policewoman in New Orleans inadvertently captures the shooting death of a young drug dealer on her body cam. After realizing the murder was committed by corrupt cops, she teams up with the only person from the community who's willing to help her. Now, she finds herself on the run from both the vengeful criminals and the lawmen who desperately want to destroy the incriminating footage.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette is once again transformed into a swan as Prince Derek prepares to battle an evil magician.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Mystery of the Enchanted Treasure
programme.desc: The spirited animals of Swan Lake help their prince and princess save the kingdom from a sinister sorceress.

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Riley (Kaitlyn Dias) is a happy, hockey-loving 11-year-old Midwestern girl, but her world turns upside-down when she and her parents move to San Francisco. Riley's emotions -- led by Joy (Amy Poehler) -- try to guide her through this difficult, life-changing event. However, the stress of the move brings Sadness (Phyllis Smith) to the forefront. When Joy and Sadness are inadvertently swept into the far reaches of Riley's mind, the only emotions left in Headquarters are Anger, Fear and Disgust.

programme.title: The Ballad of Lucy Whipple
programme.desc: A recent widow (Glenn Close) moves with her three children to the new frontier of California during the gold rush.

programme.title: A Troll in Central Park
programme.desc: After being banished from his grim kingdom, Stanley (Dom DeLuise), an amiable troll with a magical talent for growing greenery, ends up in Central Park. Struggling to adapt to his unfamiliar surroundings, Stanley is befriended by young Gus (Phillip Glasser) and his little sister, Rosie (Tawny Sunshine Glover). Soon, however, the evil troll queen, Gnorga (Cloris Leachman), sets out to make Stanley's life miserable, endangering both him and the children.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: A Royal Family Tale
programme.desc: The princess and her prince adopt a little girl, but the child is soon kidnapped and taken into the forest.

programme.title: The Sandlot 2
programme.desc: A gang of baseball playing kids manage to get hold of a model NASA rocket belonging to one of their parents. When they accidentally shoot it into a nearby junkyard, they have to make a plan to get past a super-ferocious, mutated guard dog known as "The Great Fear".

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: Two young kids become spies in attempt to save their parents, who are ex-spies, from an evil mastermind. Armed with a bag of high tech gadgets and out-of-this world transportation, Carmen (Alexa Vega) and Juni (Daryl Sabara) will bravely jet through the air, dive under the seas and crisscross the globe in a series of thrilling adventures on a mission to save their parents ... and maybe even the world.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette is once again transformed into a swan as Prince Derek prepares to battle an evil magician.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Mystery of the Enchanted Treasure
programme.desc: The spirited animals of Swan Lake help their prince and princess save the kingdom from a sinister sorceress.

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Twenty-thousand years ago, Earth is a wondrous, prehistoric world filled with great danger, not the least of which is the beginning of the Ice Age. To avoid a really bad frostbite, the planet's majestic creatures - and a few small, slothful ones - begin migrating south . The story revolves around sub-zero heroes: a woolly mammoth, a saber-toothed tiger, a sloth and a prehistoric combination of a squirrel and rat, known as Scrat.

programme.title: The Swan Princess Christmas
programme.desc: A kingdom unites to prevent a villain from destroying Christmas.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: Royally Undercover
programme.desc: A princess and her friends go under cover to investigate the arrival of mysterious visitors to their kingdom.

programme.title: Penelope
programme.desc: Born with the snout of a pig, young Penelope Wilhern (Christina Ricci) spends life a virtual prisoner in her home. Believing that the only way to break the curse is to marry one of her own kind, she meets a number of suitors, but all reject her. Two devious men, one with a grudge against the family, hire a man (James McAvoy) to pose as a suitor, but complications arise when he begins to fall in love with Penelope, and she makes a bid for freedom.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: Princess Tomorrow, Pirate Today!
programme.desc: Princess Alise and her gang of swashbucklers set out on a high seas journey. When they're shipwrecked on a wild, mysterious island, they make a new friend and work together to escape ferocious beasts.

programme.title: Born Free: A New Adventure
programme.desc: Two American teens (Jonathan Brandis, Ariana Richards) in Africa try to teach a lion cub one raised to survive in the wild.

programme.title: The Little Rascals Save the Day
programme.desc: Spanky (Jet Jurgensmeyer), Alfalfa (Drew Justice) and the rest of the gang try to raise enough cash to save a bakery.

programme.title: Flicka: Country Pride
programme.desc: Toby (Clint Black) and Flicka step in to help a stable owner (Lisa Hartman Black) and her daughter (Kacey Rohl) save their business from falling to a rival horse trainer who is stealing their clients.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: Princess Tomorrow, Pirate Today!

programme.title: Dragonheart 3: The Sorcerer's Curse
programme.desc: Drago (Ben Kingsley) the dragonand a young knight (Julian Morris) whose life he saved join forces to end an evil wizard's reign of terror.

programme.title: Baby Geniuses
programme.desc: Evil partners (Kathleen Turner, Christopher Lloyd) experiment on an infant and send his twin to a reputable research nursery.

programme.title: Rookie of the Year
programme.desc: A freak accident causes 12-year-old Little League player Henry (Thomas Ian Nicholas) to become such a powerful and accurate pitcher that the Chicago Cubs sign the junior high student to a contract. Unprepared for such a high-pressure environment, Henry falters until aging fastballer Chet Steadman (Gary Busey) takes him under his wing and teaches him how to play in the big leagues. Meanwhile, his mother's venal boyfriend (Bruce Altman) tries to sell Henry's contract to a hated opposing team.

programme.title: Flicka: Country Pride
programme.desc: Toby (Clint Black) and Flicka step in to help a stable owner (Lisa Hartman Black) and her daughter (Kacey Rohl) save their business from falling to a rival horse trainer who is stealing their clients.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Battle for the Heartfire
programme.desc: Drago, a magnificent dragon, bonds with King Gareth. When the king dies, his potential heirs, twin grandchildren who possess the dragon's unique strengths, use their inherited powers against each other to vie for the throne. When Drago's source of power - known as the Heartfire - is stolen, more than the throne is at stake, and the siblings must end their rivalry with swords and sorcery, or the kingdom may fall.

programme.title: Planet 51
programme.desc: When astronaut Capt. Charles "Chuck" Baker lands on Planet 51, he thinks he is the first life form to set foot there. He gets the surprise of his life when he learns that it is inhabited by little green people who live in an idyllic version of 1950s America -- complete with a universal fear of alien invasion.

programme.title: Pit Pony
programme.desc: An explosion at the mine causes tension on the baseball field; Nellie (Jennie Raymond) discovers a new hobby.

programme.title: Pit Pony
programme.desc: Willie is torn between his love for Sable and his duty at the mine.

programme.title: Dragonheart: A New Beginning
programme.desc: A young stable boy (Christopher Masterson) with dreams of being a knight discovers a baby dragon and tries to help him learn how to fly and fight.

programme.title: Rookie of the Year
programme.desc: A freak accident causes 12-year-old Little League player Henry (Thomas Ian Nicholas) to become such a powerful and accurate pitcher that the Chicago Cubs sign the junior high student to a contract. Unprepared for such a high-pressure environment, Henry falters until aging fastballer Chet Steadman (Gary Busey) takes him under his wing and teaches him how to play in the big leagues. programme.desc: A young stable boy (Christopher Masterson) with dreams of being a knight discovers a baby dragon and tries to help him learn how to fly and fight.

programme.title: The King and I
programme.desc: Anna, an English schoolteacher, travels to the kingdom of Siam to teach children and finds her challenge with a stubborn king. But even as a wondrous friendship grows between Anna and the arrogant monarch, an evil sorcerer is conjuring up a plot to steal the throne.

programme.title: Rookie of the Year
programme.desc: A freak accident causes 12-year-old Little League player Henry (Thomas Ian Nicholas) to become such a powerful and accurate pitcher that the Chicago Cubs sign the junior high student to a contract. Unprepared for such a high-pressure environment, Henry falters until aging fastballer Chet Steadman (Gary Busey) takes him under his wing and teaches him how to play in the big leagues. Meanwhile, his mother's venal boyfriend (Bruce Altman) tries to sell Henry's contract to a hated opposing team.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal
programme.desc: Jen (Stephen Garlick), raised by the noble race called the Mystics, has been told that he is the last survivor of his own race, the Gelflings. He sets out to try to find a shard of the dark crystal, a powerful gem that once provided balance to the universe. After the crystal was broken, the evil Skeksis used sinister means to gain control. Jen believes that he can repair the dark crystal and bring peace back to the world, if he can only find the remaining shard.

programme.title: The Sandlot 2
programme.desc: A gang of baseball playing kids manage to get hold of a model NASA rocket belonging to one of their parents. When they accidentally shoot it into a nearby junkyard, they have to make a plan to get past a super-ferocious, mutated guard dog known as "The Great Fear".

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Dickens' London miser Ebenezer Scrooge (George C. Scott) meets the ghosts of Christmases past, present and yet to come.

programme.title: Thumbelina
programme.desc: Born of a flower and growing to only a couple of inches tall, poor Thumbelina (Jodi Benson) is worried she'll never meet someone her own size, until she happens to catch the eye of Prince Cornelius of the Fairies (Gary Imhoff). Just as soon as she finds love, however, it's torn away from her when she is kidnapped by Ms. Toad (Charo). Now Thumbelina has to escape Ms. Toad's grasp and search for Prince Cornelius. Luckily, there's a whole city of animals willing to help her.

programme.title: The Adventures of Brer Rabbit
programme.desc: A mischievous rabbit (Nick Cannon) hatches clever schemes to gleefully outwit bigger animals.

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Riley (Kaitlyn Dias) is a happy, hockey-loving 11-year-old Midwestern girl, but her world turns upside-down when she and her parents move to San Francisco. Riley's emotions -- led by Joy (Amy Poehler) -- try to guide her through this difficult, life-changing event. However, the stress of the move brings Sadness (Phyllis Smith) to the forefront. When Joy and Sadness are inadvertently swept into the far reaches of Riley's mind, the only emotions left in Headquarters are Anger, Fear and Disgust.

programme.title: Carpool
programme.desc: Buttoned-down company man Daniel Miller (David Paymer), who reluctantly drives the carpool for his children and their friends when his wife is ill, stops to pick up some breakfast -- and some thugs try to carjack him. To the rescue comes Franklin Laszlo (Tom Arnold), the struggling manager of a carnival who had been considering whether to rob a bank, but instead has opted to rob the robbers. Due to complications, Franklin has to take Daniel and the whole van full of kids along for his getaway.

programme.title: Gold Diggers: The Secret of Bear Mountain
programme.desc: Beth (Christina Ricci) is a city mouse who's just arrived in the country. When her family relocates to a leafy area in the state of Washington, Beth starts hanging out with outsider Jody (Anna Chlumsky), who is constantly regaling Beth with a local legend about a woman named Molly Morgan (Amy Kirk) that supposedly hid a treasure somewhere on nearby Bear Mountain. When the girls decide to tackle Bear Mountain together, Beth learns about the not-so-happy situation Jody is dealing with at home.

programme.title: The Ballad of Lucy Whipple
programme.desc: A recent widow (Glenn Close) moves with her three children to the new frontier of California during the gold rush.

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Riley (Kaitlyn Dias) is a happy, hockey-loving 11-year-old Midwestern girl, but her world turns upside-down when she and her parents move to San Francisco. Riley's emotions -- led by Joy (Amy Poehler) -- try to guide her through this difficult, life-changing event. However, the stress of the move brings Sadness (Phyllis Smith) to the forefront. programme.title: The Dark Crystal
programme.desc: Jen (Stephen Garlick), raised by the noble race called the Mystics, has been told that he is the last survivor of his own race, the Gelflings. He sets out to try to find a shard of the dark crystal, a powerful gem that once provided balance to the universe. After the crystal was broken, the evil Skeksis used sinister means to gain control. Jen believes that he can repair the dark crystal and bring peace back to the world, if he can only find the remaining shard.

programme.title: The Edge
programme.desc: The plane carrying wealthy Charles Morse (Anthony Hopkins) crashes down in the Alaskan wilderness. Together with the two other passengers, photographer Robert Green (Alec Baldwin) and assistant Stephen (Harold Perrineau), Charles devises a plan to help them reach civilization. However, his biggest obstacle might not be the elements, or even the Kodiak bear stalking them -- it could be Robert, whom Charles has reason to believe is having an affair with his wife and would not mind seeing him dead.

programme.title: Return of the Living Dead Part II
programme.desc: A boy (Michael Kenworthy) and his friends free something evil from a canister fallen off an Army truck.

programme.title: Rig 45
programme.desc: As the state of the rig is worsened as an effect of the explosion, the remaining crew is forced to shut down power on entire levels of the rig while they try to find the killer.

programme.title: Tales From the Crypt Presents Bordello of Blood
programme.desc: After her troublemaking brother, Caleb (Corey Feldman), goes missing, Katherine Verdoux (Erika Eleniak) seeks the services of sarcastic private investigator Rafe Guttman (Dennis Miller) to track the errant youth down. Rafe eventually determines that Caleb is in the thrall of Lilith (Angie Everhart), a powerful vampire who operates a seedy brothel. When Rafe and Katherine set out to rescue Caleb, they must contend with the lethal Lilith and her evil minions.

programme.title: The Crush
programme.desc: Writer Nick Eliot (Cary Elwes) moves to a new city for a magazine job and rents a room in the house of Cliff (Kurtwood Smith) and Liv Forrester (Gwynyth Walsh), whose 14-year-old daughter, Adrian (Alicia Silverstone), instantly makes her attraction to Nick clear. While Nick romances photographer Amy Maddik (Jennifer Rubin) at work, he has trouble fending off Adrian's advances. As her obsession with Nick grows, Adrian becomes angry at being rejected and starts attacking his property and friends.

programme.title: The Marine 2
programme.desc: A Marine sniper (Ted DiBiase) must save his wife (Lara Cox) and other hostages when rebels seize a luxury resort.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers
programme.desc: After making a horrific discovery in the basement of an old abandoned church, Trish (Gina Philips) and her brother Darry (Justin Long) watch their routine road trip home from college turn into a heart-stopping race for their lives. They find themselves the chosen prey of an indestructible force that relentlessly pursues them and gives a new and chilling meaning to the old song "Jeepers Creepers."

programme.title: Chain Reaction
programme.desc: At a Chicago university, a research team that includes brilliant Eddie Kasalivich (Keanu Reeves) experiences a breakthrough: a stable form of fusion that may lead to a waste-free energy source. However, Dr. Paul Shannon (Morgan Freeman) has ties to a private company that wants to exploit the technology, so Kasalivich and Dr. Lily Sinclair (Rachel Weisz) are framed for murder, and the fusion device is stolen. On the run from the FBI, they must recover the technology and exonerate themselves.

programme.title: The Beach
programme.desc: The desire to find something real -- to connect with something or someone -- is what drives Richard (Leonardo DiCaprio), a young American backpacker who arrives in Thailand with adventure on his mind. Etienne (Guillaume Canet) and Francoise (Virginie Ledoyen) join him on an adventure to "The Beach," a mystical paradise. However, this paradise is less than perfect.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: This live action feature is inspired by the most successful interactive video-game character in history -- Lara Croft. Beautiful and brainy, Lara (Angelina Jolie) is the heroine of Eidos Interactive's phenomenally successful "Tomb Raider" game series. It is one woman's fearless quest criss-crossing the globe, in an amazing attempt to save the world.

programme.title: The Crush
programme.desc: Writer Nick Eliot (Cary Elwes) moves to a new city for a magazine job and rents a room in the house of Cliff (Kurtwood Smith) and Liv Forrester (Gwynyth Walsh), whose 14-year-old daughter, Adrian (Alicia Silverstone), instantly makes her attraction to Nick clear. While Nick romances photographer Amy Maddik (Jennifer Rubin) at work, he has trouble fending off Adrian's advances. As her obsession with Nick grows, Adrian becomes angry at being rejected and starts attacking his property and friends.

programme.title: The Place Beyond the Pines
programme.desc: In upstate New York, two men (Ryan Gosling, Bradley Cooper), and later, their sons (Dane DeHaan, Emory Cohen) must deal with the unforeseen consequences of their actions.

programme.title: John Grisham's The Rainmaker
programme.desc: Struggling new attorney Rudy Baylor (Matt Damon) resorts to working for a shady lawyer (Mickey Rourke), where he meets paralegal Deck Shifflet (Danny DeVito). When the insurance company of Dot Black (Mary Kay Place) refuses her dying son coverage, Baylor and Shifflet team up to fight the corrupt corporation, taking on its callous lawyer (Jon Voight). Meanwhile, Baylor becomes involved with Kelly Riker (Claire Danes), an abused wife, whose husband complicates matters when he confronts Baylor.

programme.title: Chain Reaction
programme.desc: At a Chicago university, a research team that includes brilliant Eddie Kasalivich (Keanu Reeves) experiences a breakthrough: a stable form of fusion that may lead to a waste-free energy source. However, Dr. Paul Shannon (Morgan Freeman) has ties to a private company that wants to exploit the technology, so Kasalivich and Dr. Lily Sinclair (Rachel Weisz) are framed for murder, and the fusion device is stolen. On the run from the FBI, they must recover the technology and exonerate themselves.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: This live action feature is inspired by the most successful interactive video-game character in history -- Lara Croft. Beautiful and brainy, Lara (Angelina Jolie) is the heroine of Eidos Interactive's phenomenally successful "Tomb Raider" game series. It is one woman's fearless quest criss-crossing the globe, in an amazing attempt to save the world.

programme.title: The Place Beyond the Pines
programme.desc: In upstate New York, two men (Ryan Gosling, Bradley Cooper), and later, their sons (Dane DeHaan, Emory Cohen) must deal with the unforeseen consequences of their actions.

programme.title: Rig 45
programme.desc: The crew splits up in two separate teams suspecting each other.

programme.title: Rig 45
programme.desc: A cat and mouse game commences on the desolate rig.

programme.title: Natural Born Killers
programme.desc: Woody Harrelson and Juliette Lewis are two young, attractive serial killers who become tabloid-TV darlings, thanks to a sensationalistic press led by Robert Downey Jr. The press reports the pair as they go on a 52 people killing spree. A controversial look at the way the media portrays criminals.

programme.title: The Fury
programme.desc: When a devious plot separates CIA agent Peter Sandza (Kirk Douglas) from his son, Robin (Andrew Stevens), the distraught father manages to see through the ruse. Taken because of his psychic abilities, Robin is being held by Ben Childress (John Cassavetes), who is studying people with supernatural powers in hopes of developing their talents as weapons. Soon Peter pairs up with Gillian (Amy Irving), a teen who has telekinesis, to find and rescue Robin.

Ben Campbell (Jim Sturgess), a brilliant student at Massachusetts Institute of Technology, needs some quick cash to pay his tuition bills. He joins a group of students who, under the leadership of unorthodox professor Mickey Rosa (Kevin Spacey), use their math skills to win big in Las Vegas. Seduced by a beautiful teammate (Kate Bosworth) and loads of money, Ben learns that the stakes are higher than he ever imagined when he crosses paths with casino enforcer Cole Williams (Laurence Fishburne).

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: The epic story of Henri "Papillon" Charrière, a safecracker from the Parisian underworld who is framed for murder and condemned to life in the notorious penal colony on Devil's Island. Determined to regain his freedom, Papillon forms an unlikely alliance with convicted counterfeiter Louis Dega, who in exchange for protection, agrees to finance Papillon's escape.

programme.title: Flatliners
programme.desc: Seeking answers about the afterlife, Chicago medical student Nelson (Kiefer Sutherland) persuades his fellow pupils to help him end his life, and then resuscitate him in the nick of time. Atheist David (Kevin Bacon), playboy Joe (William Baldwin) and troubled Rachel (Julia Roberts) also journey into the unknown, looking for meaning in their own lives. As the experiments become more perilous, each is forced to contend with the paranormal consequences of trespassing on the other side.

programme.title: Copycat
programme.desc: Deeply shaken after being assaulted by a deranged man (Harry Connick Jr.), Dr. Helen Hudson (Sigourney Weaver) must face her fears if she is to help solve a series of murders. Helen is a psychologist who has studied serial killers, but this case, in which the crimes seem modeled on the work of infamous deviants, is grimmer than most. With the help of two San Francisco police officers (Holly Hunter, Dermot Mulroney), Helen tries to come between the murderer and his next victim.

programme.title: Extinction
programme.desc: When an infection turns most of humanity into rabid zombies, two men (Matthew Fox, Jeffrey Donovan) and a 9-year-old girl (Quinn McColgan) must barricade themselves against their monstrous attackers.

programme.title: Bat 21
programme.desc: Lt. Col. Iceal Hambleton (Gene Hackman) is shot down behind enemy lines during the waning days of the Vietnam War. His only connection to the outside world is through radio transmission with Capt. Bartholomew "Bird-Dog" Clark (Danny Glover), a pilot who helps him craft an escape plan and maintain his sanity. Lacking survival skills and unfamiliar with the harsh terrain in Vietnam, Hambleton is forced to fight for his life as he witnesses the shocking horrors of war.

Ben Campbell (Jim Sturgess), a brilliant student at Massachusetts Institute of Technology, needs some quick cash to pay his tuition bills. He joins a group of students who, under the leadership of unorthodox professor Mickey Rosa (Kevin Spacey), use their math skills to win big in Las Vegas. Seduced by a beautiful teammate (Kate Bosworth) and loads of money, Ben learns that the stakes are higher than he ever imagined when he crosses paths with casino enforcer Cole Williams (Laurence Fishburne).

programme.title: Copycat
programme.desc: Deeply shaken after being assaulted by a deranged man (Harry Connick Jr.), Dr. Helen Hudson (Sigourney Weaver) must face her fears if she is to help solve a series of murders. Helen is a psychologist who has studied serial killers, but this case, in which the crimes seem modeled on the work of infamous deviants, is grimmer than most. With the help of two San Francisco police officers (Holly Hunter, Dermot Mulroney), Helen tries to come between the murderer and his next victim.

programme.title: Dark Tide
programme.desc: A traumatized shark expert (Halle Berry) must battle her own fears to lead a thrill-seeking businessman on a dive into a dangerous section of water known as "Shark Alley."

programme.title: The Grudge 2
programme.desc: A young woman (Amber Tamblyn) encounters a terrible curse while searching for her missing sister (Sarah Michelle Gellar) in Tokyo. The evil imprecation fills its victims with murderous rage, but it also brings together the diverse group to unlock its secret and save their lives.

programme.title: Evil Dead
programme.desc: Mia (Jane Levy), a drug addict, is determined to kick the habit. To that end, she asks her brother, David (Shiloh Fernandez), his girlfriend, Natalie (Elizabeth Blackmore) and their friends Olivia (Jessica Lucas) and Eric (Lou Taylor Pucci) to accompany her to their family's remote forest cabin to help her through withdrawal. Eric finds a mysterious Book of the Dead at the cabin and reads aloud from it, awakening an ancient demon. All hell breaks loose when the malevolent entity possesses Mia.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Retribution
programme.desc: As Umbrella Corp.'s deadly T-virus continues to turn the world's population into legions of flesh-eating zombies, Alice (Milla Jovovich), the human race's last hope, awakes deep within Umbrella's secret operations facility. The further she delves into the complex, the more of her mysterious past is unveiled. Her global hunt for those responsible for the outbreak leads to a mind-blowing revelation; Aided by friends old and new, Alice fights to escape from a world on the edge of oblivion.

programme.title: Bat 21
programme.desc: Lt. Col. Iceal Hambleton (Gene Hackman) is shot down behind enemy lines during the waning days of the Vietnam War. His only connection to the outside world is through radio transmission with Capt. Bartholomew "Bird-Dog" Clark (Danny Glover), a pilot who helps him craft an escape plan and maintain his sanity. Lacking survival skills and unfamiliar with the harsh terrain in Vietnam, Hambleton is forced to fight for his life as he witnesses the shocking horrors of war.

programme.title: Copycat
programme.desc: Deeply shaken after being assaulted by a deranged man (Harry Connick Jr.), Dr. Helen Hudson (Sigourney Weaver) must face her fears if she is to help solve a series of murders. Helen is a psychologist who has studied serial killers, but this case, in which the crimes seem modeled on the work of infamous deviants, is grimmer than most. With the help of two San Francisco police officers (Holly Hunter, Dermot Mulroney), Helen tries to come between the murderer and his next victim.

programme.title: Dark Tide
programme.desc: A traumatized shark expert (Halle Berry) must battle her own fears to lead a thrill-seeking businessman on a dive into a dangerous section of water known as "Shark Alley."

programme.title: Premium Rush
programme.desc: For bike messenger Wilee (Joseph Gordon-Levitt), dodging speeding cars, evading crazy cabdrivers, and blowing by millions of cranky pedestrians is all in a day's work. Wilee is one of the best in a dangerous job, and his bike of choice is a Fixie, a lightweight, single-gear unit without brakes. Though Wilee knows that one day he may end up as a smear on the pavement -- he is unprepared for what happens after his last run of the day turns into a life-or-death chase through Manhattan.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Retribution
programme.desc: As Umbrella Corp.'s deadly T-virus continues to turn the world's population into legions of flesh-eating zombies, Alice (Milla Jovovich), the human race's last hope, awakes deep within Umbrella's secret operations facility. The further she delves into the complex, the more of her mysterious past is unveiled. Her global hunt for those responsible for the outbreak leads to a mind-blowing revelation; Aided by friends old and new, Alice fights to escape from a world on the edge of oblivion.

programme.title: The Lazarus Effect
programme.desc: Medical researcher Frank (Mark Duplass), his fiancee Zoe (Olivia Wilde) and their team have achieved the impossible: they have found a way to revive the dead. After a successful, but unsanctioned, experiment on a lifeless animal, they are ready to make their work public. However, when their dean learns what they've done, he shuts them down. Zoe is killed during an attempt to recreate the experiment, leading Frank to test the process on her. Zoe is revived -- but something evil is within her.

programme.title: Hood Rat
programme.desc: A vengeful madman (Isaiah Washington) and his would-be victims join forces to stave off an invasion by deadly vermin.

programme.title: Black Dog
programme.desc: An ex-con takes a job truck driving across the country. However, the truck is filled with illegal weapons and now he must fight to save his family. The stakes are high as gun runners, government agents and a fleet of monstrous 18-wheelers pursue him in an intense highway duel.

programme.title: Hustle and Heat
programme.desc: An investigator (Duane Martin) and his partner (Vivica A. Fox) probe the mysterious death of a promising rapper.

programme.title: The Lazarus Effect
programme.desc: Medical researcher Frank (Mark Duplass), his fiancee Zoe (Olivia Wilde) and their team have achieved the impossible: they have found a way to revive the dead. After a successful, but unsanctioned, experiment on a lifeless animal, they are ready to make their work public. However, when their dean learns what they've done, he shuts them down. Zoe is killed during an attempt to recreate the experiment, leading Frank to test the process on her. Zoe is revived -- but something evil is within her.

programme.title: My Soul to Take
programme.desc: In the small town of Riverton, a local legend tells of a serial killer's oath to come back and kill the seven children who were born on the night he supposedly died. Now 16 years later, Riverton residents are disappearing again, making some wonder if the legend is true. Bug (Max Thieriot), plagued by nightmares all his life, is one of the so-called Riverton Seven, and it's up to him to save his friends from an evil that will not rest.

programme.title: The Siege
programme.desc: After terrorists attack a bus in Brooklyn, a Broadway theater and FBI headquarters, FBI anti-terrorism expert Anthony Hubbard (Denzel Washington) teams up with CIA agent Elise Kraft (Annette Bening) to investigate. Soon, martial law is declared in New York City, and General William Devereaux (Bruce Willis), a sadistic racist, is put in command. When Devereaux begins rounding up Arab-Americans and forcing them into a detention camp, Hubbard and Kraft must fight back in the name of freedom.

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Discreet, idealistic and intensely loyal, Edward Wilson (Matt Damon) finds that service in the OSS and later as a founding member of the Central Intelligence Agency is the perfect career for a man of his talents. His methods become standard operating procedure for the CIA while he combats his counterparts in the KGB. But, as the country slips deeper into the Cold War, Edward finds that dedication to duty above family has a price.

programme.title: Premium Rush
programme.desc: For bike messenger Wilee (Joseph Gordon-Levitt), dodging speeding cars, evading crazy cabdrivers, and blowing by millions of cranky pedestrians is all in a day's work. Wilee is one of the best in a dangerous job, and his bike of choice is a Fixie, a lightweight, single-gear unit without brakes. Though Wilee knows that one day he may end up as a smear on the pavement -- he is unprepared for what happens after his last run of the day turns into a life-or-death chase through Manhattan.

programme.desc: Medical researcher Frank (Mark Duplass), his fiancee Zoe (Olivia Wilde) and their team have achieved the impossible: they have found a way to revive the dead. After a successful, but unsanctioned, experiment on a lifeless animal, they are ready to make their work public. However, when their dean learns what they've done, he shuts them down. Zoe is killed during an attempt to recreate the experiment, leading Frank to test the process on her. Zoe is revived -- but something evil is within her.

programme.title: Kings
programme.desc: Millie is a hardworking, tough and protective Los Angeles single mother with an affection for homeless children. Her neighbor Obie is the local loose cannon -- and the only white man -- in an area largely inhabited by African-Americans, Latinos and Koreans. With racial tensions running high, Millie and Obie appear to be unlikely allies. But following the acquittal of four of the officers accused of beating Rodney King, the two of them must navigate the gathering chaos in the city.

programme.title: Hustle and Heat
programme.desc: An investigator (Duane Martin) and his partner (Vivica A. Fox) probe the mysterious death of a promising rapper.

programme.title: My Soul to Take
programme.desc: In the small town of Riverton, a local legend tells of a serial killer's oath to come back and kill the seven children who were born on the night he supposedly died. Now 16 years later, Riverton residents are disappearing again, making some wonder if the legend is true. Bug (Max Thieriot), plagued by nightmares all his life, is one of the so-called Riverton Seven, and it's up to him to save his friends from an evil that will not rest.

programme.title: Absolute Deception
programme.desc: A female journalist (Emmanuelle Vaugier) teams up with a federal agent (Cuba Gooding Jr.) to uncover the truth behind her husband's death.

programme.title: The Siege
programme.desc: After terrorists attack a bus in Brooklyn, a Broadway theater and FBI headquarters, FBI anti-terrorism expert Anthony Hubbard (Denzel Washington) teams up with CIA agent Elise Kraft (Annette Bening) to investigate. When Devereaux begins rounding up Arab-Americans and forcing them into a detention camp, Hubbard and Kraft must fight back in the name of freedom.

programme.title: Kings
programme.desc: Millie is a hardworking, tough and protective Los Angeles single mother with an affection for homeless children. Her neighbor Obie is the local loose cannon -- and the only white man -- in an area largely inhabited by African-Americans, Latinos and Koreans. With racial tensions running high, Millie and Obie appear to be unlikely allies. But following the acquittal of four of the officers accused of beating Rodney King, the two of them must navigate the gathering chaos in the city.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Pascal Sauvage, un villano que quiere robar las joyas de la Corona británica, asesinó a los mejores agentes encubiertos y ahora Johnny English es el encargado de evitar un caos. Pero, incluso con la ayuda de su secuaz Bough, el agente se mete en problemas. Cuando conoce a la agente de la Interpol Lorna Campbell, Johnny logra destruir las defensas de Pascal.

programme.title: Johnny English 3.0
programme.desc: Un ciberataque revela la identidad de todos los agentes secretos del Reino Unido y Johnny English es la última esperanza del servicio secreto. Una esperanza un tanto ridícula y con poca maña para la tecnología, pero una esperanza, al fin y al cabo.

programme.title: Así en la Tierra como en el infierno
programme.desc: Kilómetros y kilómetros de tortuosas catacumbas yacen bajo las calles de París, plagadas de incontables almas. Cuando un equipo de exploradores se aventura en este desconocido laberinto, se descubre cuál fue la verdadera función de esta ciudad.

programme.title: La bruja
programme.desc: Nueva Inglaterra, 1630. Una familia compuesta por un matrimonio de colonos cristianos, padres de cinco hijos, vive cerca de un bosque al que la leyenda popular atribuye un carácter demoníaco. La convivencia estalla y la familia se desgarra al sospechar que su hija mayor practica la brujería, debido a que las cosechas no crecen y su bebé ha desaparecido.

programme.title: La oscuridad
programme.desc: Una joven zombi acecha el remoto bosque donde fue asesinada décadas antes. Una noche descubre a un niño ciego escondido en el maletero del automóvil de su siguiente víctima. Él también ha sido víctima de abusos, por lo que ambos encuentran consuelo en el otro.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Judd Apatow, Gloria Calderon-Kellett, Scott Silveri, David Mandel, Kenya Barris y Phoebe Waller-Bridge conversan sobre las producciones que compiten en los premios Emmy 2017.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Las actrices del drama proclamadas de la TV hablan sobre el racismo, el sexo y la discriminación por edad en Hollywood.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Mark Ruffalo, Will Smith, Michael Caine, Benico Del Toro, Samuel L. Jackson y Joel Edgerton hablan acerca de sus carreras.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Justin Timberlake, John Legend, Pharrell Williams, Alicia Keys y Tori Amos conversan sobre sus canciones que aparecen en películas.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Los realizadores de documentales Amy Berg, Kirby Dick, Liz Garbus, Alex Gibney, Michael Moore y Elizabeth Chai Vasarhelyi hablan sobre avalanchas, fiduciarios espinosos y amenazas de muerte.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Pamela Adlon, Minnie Driver, America Ferrera, Kathryn Hahn, Issa Rae y Emmy Rossum son las protagonistas de las comedias de 2017.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Los comediantes Jeffrey Tambor, Aziz Ansari, Anthony Anderson, Tony Hale, Jerrod Carmichael, Rob Lowe, Keegan-Michael Key, hablan sobre todo lo relacionado con la comedia.

programme.title: Me vuelvo loco
programme.desc: Christian es un adolescente que cree ser diferente a los demás: piensa que todo le pasa a él. En un diario, decide plasmar las historias más divertidas de su infancia y su adolescencia.

programme.title: Querido dictador
programme.desc: Un dictador derrocado responde a la carta de una adolescente que vive con su madre soltera y se presenta en casa de ambas cuando tiene que exiliarse. Estando allá ayuda a la joven a organizar una revolución contra las chicas populares de su escuela.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Un debate en el que participan las actrices Nicole Kidman, Reese Witherspoon, Elizabeth Moss, Chrissy Metz, Oprah Winfrey y Jessica Lange, quienes hablan sobre su profesión.

programme.title: Lady Bird
programme.desc: Marion McPherson, una enfermera de California, trabaja incansablemente para sustentar a su familia desde que su esposo quedó desempleado. Marion tiene problemas con su hija adolescente, de inclinaciones artísticas y temperamento fuerte.

programme.title: Las vacaciones de Mr. Bean
programme.desc: Cuando el clima húmedo de Londres se vuelve insoportable, Mr. Bean se dirige a la Costa Azul para divertirse bajo el sol. Como siempre le ocurre, sus planes no resultan como esperaba, y lo terminan confundiendo con un secuestrador y con un reconocido cineasta.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Pascal Sauvage, un villano que quiere robar las joyas de la Corona británica, asesinó a los mejores agentes encubiertos y ahora Johnny English es el encargado de evitar un caos. Pero, incluso con la ayuda de su secuaz Bough, el agente se mete en problemas. Cuando conoce a la agente de la Interpol Lorna Campbell, Johnny logra destruir las defensas de Pascal.

programme.title: Johnny English 3.0
programme.desc: Un ciberataque revela la identidad de todos los agentes secretos del Reino Unido y Johnny English es la última esperanza del servicio secreto. Una esperanza un tanto ridícula y con poca maña para la tecnología, pero una esperanza, al fin y al cabo.

programme.title: Una pareja más tonta
programme.desc: Tras descubrir que necesita un trasplante de riñón y que tiene una hija, Harry Dunne emprende un viaje en carretera con su amigo Lloyd Christmas.

programme.title: Zapatero a tus zapatos
programme.desc: Un zapatero frustrado se encuentra una máquina de coser mágica que le permite ver el mundo de una nueva manera por entrar en la vida de sus clientes.

programme.title: Atrapen al gringo
programme.desc: Durante una persecución con la patrulla fronteriza, Driver estrella su auto contra el muro de la frontera. Tras ser apresado por las autoridades mexicanas, es enviado a una prisión de alta seguridad, donde recibe la inesperada ayuda de un niño de diez años que conoce como pocos el lugar.

programme.title: Asesino a sueldo
programme.desc: Una situación de identidad equivocada pone a un hombre llamado Slevin (Josh Hartnett) en medio de una guerra entre dos grandes del crimen en Nueva York : El Rabbi (Ben Kingsley) y el Boss (Morgan Freeman). Así, bajo la mirada del detective Brikowski (Stanley Tucci) y el ampliamente reconocido asesino Goodkat (Bruce Willis), Slevin deberá idear un plan para salvar su vida antes de que sea demasiado tarde.

programme.title: Red de corrupción
programme.desc: Después de presenciar lo que parece ser un asesinato, un mensajero que trabaja en bicicleta se involucra en un mundo de corrupción y carreras ilegales.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Cate Blanchett, Jane Fonda, Brie Larson, Jennifer Lawrence, Helen Mirren, Carey Mulligan, Charlotte Rampling y Kate Winslet hablan de por qué actúan, si se ven a sí mismas en la pantalla y con quién quieren trabajar.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Seis directores innovadores, David O. Russell, Alejandro G. Iñárritu, Quentin Tarantino, Danny Boyle, Tom Hooper, Ridley Scott, hablan sobre filmar en condiciones climáticas adversas y trabajar con talento.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Riz Ahmed, Sterling K. Brown, John Lithgow, Ewan McGregor, Billy Bob Thornton y Jeffrey Wright explican en qué escenas estuvieron más nerviosos y cuál es el proceso para desprenderse de un personaje.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Seis importantes creadores de televisión hablan acerca de superar los límites en la comedia y qué inspira su creatividad. Además, la diferencia entre escribir para cadena o una plataforma streaming.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Ava DuVernay, Noah Hawley, David E. Kelley, Jenji Kohan, Lisa Joy y Ryan Murphy hablan sobre cómo filmar temas delicados y sobre cuáles son las familias de la televisión con las que más se identifican.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Ava DuVernay, Patty Jenkins, Adam McKay, Jean-Marc Vallee y David Nutter hablan sobre su trabajo como directores de series de televisión.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Seis grandes directores hablan sobre sus influencias y su inspiración para crear películas.

programme.title: Triunfos robados
programme.desc: Un equipo de porristas compiten contra el equipo de una escuela de la ciudad por un codiciado título nacional.

programme.title: Hombre de familia
programme.desc: Un extraño le muestra a un corredor de Wall Street cómo hubiese sido su vida si se hubiera casado con su novia de la juventud.

programme.title: El diario de Bridget Jones
programme.desc: Las crónicas diarias de una joven divertida, pero acomplejada, cuya vida sentimental está siempre en crisis; y que vive obsesionada con la idea de bajar de peso, dejar de fumar y conseguir novio.

programme.title: Bridget Jones, al borde de la razón
programme.desc: Bridget Jones ya es feliz, sin embargo, una inoportuna amiga arruina su relación con Mark y, además, en el trabajo le va mal. Lo peor se produce cuando vive la semana más espantosa de su vida en un viaje a Tailandia.

programme.title: Solo amigos
programme.desc: Chris le confiesa su amor a Jamie, sin embargo, ella le parte el corazón porque solo lo quiere como amigo. Diez años después, Chris se ha convertido en un atractivo productor musical y, en un viaje, se reencuentra con Jamie.

programme.title: Al diablo con el amor
programme.desc: Genevieve es una florista que tiene un peculiar modo de ver la vida. Tras haber sufrido demasiado, debido a las decepciones amorosas, la joven ha decidido no tener más relaciones largas para evitar sufrir. Sin embargo, esta declaración de intenciones se ve truncada cuando conoce a Greg, el dueño de un restaurante que tampoco ha tenido demasiada suerte en el amor. Entre ellos surgirá una atracción difícil de evitar.

programme.title: Papá por Accidente

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Un caso que involucra a narcotraficantes y un asesinato en el sur de Florida da un giro personal para los detectives encubiertos Sonny Crockett y Ricardo Tubbs. El poco ortodoxo Crockett se enamora de la esposa china-cubana de un traficante de armas y drogas, mientras Tubbs se enfrenta a un ataque en contra de sus seres queridos.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter

programme.title: El árbol de la vida
programme.desc: Desilusionado en un mundo moderno, un hombre trata de hacer las paces con la complicada relación que compartió con su padre.

programme.desc: Una restauradora se involucra en un romance con su exmarido, que se ha vuelto a casar, mientras un arquitecto al que contrató para remodelar su cocina se enamora de ella.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Donna, una hotelera independiente de las islas griegas, prepara la boda de su hija con la ayuda de dos viejos amigos. Mientras tanto, Sophie, la alegre hija de Donna, tiene su propio plan. Invita a la boda a tres hombres del pasado de su madre con la esperanza de conocer a su padre biológico para que la acompañe al altar.

programme.title: Al diablo con el amor
programme.desc: Genevieve es una florista que tiene un peculiar modo de ver la vida. Tras haber sufrido demasiado, debido a las decepciones amorosas, la joven ha decidido no tener más relaciones largas para evitar sufrir. Sin embargo, esta declaración de intenciones se ve truncada cuando conoce a Greg, el dueño de un restaurante que tampoco ha tenido demasiada suerte en el amor. Entre ellos surgirá una atracción difícil de evitar.

programme.title: Papá por Accidente

programme.desc: Lauren Adrian, una reportera de Chicago, viaja a México para investigar los asesinatos sin resolver de cientos de mujeres que han ocurrido durante años cerca de una fábrica de origen estadounidense. Lauren se reúne con Alfonso Díaz, su examante y colega, quien publica las muertes a pesar de las amenazas de las autoridades locales. Los dos juntos buscan la verdad e intentan ayudar a la sobreviviente de un brutal ataque.

programme.title: Juego de espías
programme.desc: El día de su jubilación, el veterano agente de la CIA Nathan Muir recibe la noticia de que su discípulo, Tom Bishop, se ha metido en un buen lío: acusado de espionaje, se encuentra en una prisión china y será ejecutado en un plazo de 24 horas.

programme.title: Experimenter
programme.desc: En 1961, el psicólogo Stanley Milgram llevó a cabo en Yale unos controvertidos experimentos, tachados de sádicos por sus críticos, en los que estudió cuáles eran los límites de la obediencia, y dónde comienza el libre albedrío. La investigación se originó a raíz del juicio a Adolf Eichmann (el criminal de guerra nazi que alegó obediencia debida en su defensa durante su juicio en Israel).

programme.title: Al rojo vivo

Se caracteriza por ofrecer, antes que nadie, historias que cautivan al público hispano y por presentarlas en un formato innovador, que resalta el aspecto humano de cada noticia. El programa cuenta con un estelar equipo de reporteros, colaboradores y presentadores a lo largo y ancho del país.

programme.title: Hoy día
programme.desc: El show de las mañanas que mejor informa con las noticias más oportunas, equilibradas y relevantes que la comunidad hispana en EE. UU. necesita. Los eventos más importantes de la jornada, el entretenimiento, el pronóstico del tiempo, las recetas de cocina y los consejos para una vida sana.

programme.title: Caso cerrado
programme.desc: Bernardo es un estilista que ayudó a su amiga Tania a salir de Cuba, y ahora ella le tendió una mano a él. También, Pedro olvidó que su hija estaba en el auto, y la niña murió.

programme.title: Caso cerrado
programme.desc: Catalina ayudó a la hija de Antonia cuando la niña sufrió apendicitis. Pero se obsesionó con ella, al verla parecida a su hija fallecida, y le cambió la identidad.

programme.title: Decisiones
programme.desc: Apasionantes y conmovedoras historias en hechos de la vida que muestran cómo las personas resuelven situaciones a las que se ven enfrentados.

programme.title: Identidad oculta
programme.desc: Años después de que hombres de negocios mataran a su padre y ordenaran la muerte de su hermano gemelo, un modesto pescador adopta una nueva personalidad para vengarse.

programme.title: Noticias Telemundo mediodía
programme.desc: Un programa único que narra las noticias de una manera atractiva y perspicaz. Se presentan historias locales y nacionales en vivo.

programme.title: Yo soy Betty, la fea
programme.desc: Beatriz Pinzón tiene un título en finanzas y consigue empleo en Ecomoda, una de las compañías más importantes de la industria. Todo cambia cuando en su trabajo conoce y se enamora de Armando Mendoza.

programme.title: En casa con Telemundo
programme.desc: En casa con Telemundo une a las familias, ofrece entretenimiento y buenas noticias. Un show que muestra el ingenio y la creatividad durante la cuarentena. Consejos útiles y divertidos, videos de los famosos para lidiar con la crisis. Tips de salud, cocina y bienestar para enfrentar el COVID-19 de la mano de médicos y los más calificados especialistas.

programme.title: Suelta la sopa
programme.desc: Lo último que está sucediendo dentro del círculo de la farándula, es revelado en esta serie por sus presentadores extrovertidos, que no tienen ningún problema en soltar la lengua y contarlo todo, los chismes, los escándalos, son comentados de forma exhaustiva, las primicias exclusivas y las imágenes más recientes de las estrellas que están haciendo los titulares de los medios de comunicación, son divulgadas en este espacio cuyas cámaras recorren varios lugares en el territorio estadounidense y en México. Se caracteriza por ofrecer, antes que nadie, historias que cautivan al público hispano y por presentarlas en un formato innovador, que resalta el aspecto humano de cada noticia. El programa cuenta con un estelar equipo de reporteros, colaboradores y presentadores a lo largo y ancho del país.

programme.title: En casa con Telemundo
programme.desc: En casa con Telemundo une a las familias, ofrece entretenimiento y buenas noticias. Un show que muestra el ingenio y la creatividad durante la cuarentena. Consejos útiles y divertidos, videos de los famosos para lidiar con la crisis. Tips de salud, cocina y bienestar para enfrentar el COVID-19 de la mano de médicos y los más calificados especialistas.

programme.title: Noticias Telemundo mediodía
programme.desc: Un programa único que narra las noticias de una manera atractiva y perspicaz. Se presentan historias locales y nacionales en vivo.

programme.title: La suerte de Loli

programme.title: Café con aroma de mujer
programme.desc: Gaviota y Sebastián sienten un amor casi imposible. Para poder disfrutarlo, tendrán que superar obstáculos, como la resistencia familiar y las relaciones del pasado.

programme.title: 12 corazones
programme.desc: Programa de concurso picante, ligero y excitante, dirigido a la audiencia joven hispana, presentado por Penélope Menchaca, el cual busca formar una o varias parejas entre los concursantes que se gusten y se sientan atraídos. Los doce concursantes, entre hombres y mujeres representan los 12 signos zodiacales, ellos se van eliminando mutuamente si no encuentran pareja. Los participantes comparan la apariencia, puntos de vista y personalidad. Penélope está acompañada de uno de los dos presentadores que aparecen en diferentes episodios, el astrólogo Edward'O que explica la personalidad de los concursantes basada en sus signos zodiacales y Maximiliano Palacio que comparte ideas y pensamientos poéticos relacionados con el amor. Cada episodio tiene una temática especial, como: "Especial de Salvavidas"; "Especial de las Piernas"; "Especial de Autos", entre muchos más.

programme.title: Suelta la sopa
programme.desc: Lo último que está sucediendo dentro del círculo de la farándula, es revelado en esta serie por sus presentadores extrovertidos, que no tienen ningún problema en soltar la lengua y contarlo todo, los chismes, los escándalos, son comentados de forma exhaustiva, las primicias exclusivas y las imágenes más recientes de las estrellas que están haciendo los titulares de los medios de comunicación, son divulgadas en este espacio cuyas cámaras recorren varios lugares en el territorio estadounidense y en México. Un espacio que mantiene actualizado al público y fanáticos de lo que está sucediendo con los famosos.

programme.title: Caso cerrado
programme.desc: Oslenin paga las consecuencias desastrosas de su hermano racista y abusador. Además, Brayan padece de eyaculación precoz y su esposa lo obliga a usar una dolorosa técnica sexual.
